content.rendered:
KWIKBET REVIEW

KwikBet is one of the many betting platforms in Kenya today. In the thought and competitive gambling industry in the country, it is only when a betting site offers more on the table so that it can get a distinctive share of the market. What this means is that these betting sites have to come up with ways of penetrating the market and luring customers. Kwikbet is one of the many betting platforms that allows both online members and those without access to the internet to place bets. One of the standout features of this site is their daily jackpot. They offer a daily jackpot option whereby 7 teams are chosen and members are allowed to predict and win. This is a unique feature that is present in very few other betting sites. One let down of this site is the fact that it puts more attention on soccer matches and less attention on other sports.

Kwikbet at a glance

Easy Jackpot – 10/10

Ease of Use – 8/10

Features – 6/10

Odds – 6/10

Markets Offered – 7/10

Customer Service – 8/10

Summary

That being said, this betting site is exceptional for a number of reasons and any soccer enthusiast should definitely get an account on this betting site. It further has a user-friendly interface that makes your betting experience so much better.

OVERALL

7.5/10

In-depth Review

Features

User-friendly interface

This betting site offers a simple layout from which one can easily be able to navigate their way around the whole site. This is important because customers do not enjoy struggling to find information on matches or locating various teams.

Customer care.

Despite a few complaints here and there, Kwikbets have a customer care option that allows them to handle any customer concerns. Their customer care numbers are  0791290028 or 0725290028.

Registration bonus.

Nothing gets the interest levels of gamblers up more than the word “bonus.” Upon registration, each member is entitled to a registration bonus of up to Ksh 5,000. This is an interesting offer, given that nit every betting site has this option.

 Cashout option .

This is an option that allows a gambler to remove the money they have accumulated in an ongoing multibet and forfeit the remaining matches. This is particularly useful if you have second doubt about those remaining matches.

Kwik League 

If you love virtual games then look no further. Kwikbet allows you to make money fast through their virtual games which are played in real time. It works just like those other games, save for the fact that virtual games usually take a shorter time to end. There have however been a number of complaints about how slow this option is, on clients’ mobile phones.

Casino games

This betting site also offers multiple casino games for you to enjoy. If you are a casino fan, then this betting site is a “must join” for you.

Edit bets

This is a unique betting option that allows you to make changes to an existing running bet. You care able to add or remove matches from your multi bet slip, provided that option has been availed to you.

Jackpot

Seven selections from different leagues across the globe winner that predicts seven matches correctly takes home a prize of ksh 1,000,000.

Sports You Can Bet On

Basketball

Rugby

Tennis

Soccer

Boxing

Pros

Affordable jackpot amount to bet on

Affordable minimum amount to bet on

Daily jackpot

Only seven jackpot selections

Cons

Withdrawal charges

Limited sports to bet on

Mpesa transactions only

Poor design

No live betting

No promotions.

Cashout not available

No social media platform

FAQs

How to Register via SMS

In order to join this bet site via SMS, you ought to SMS the word “KWIKBET” to 29020 and you will receive a confirmation message from 29020. From there now you will be ready to place a bet.

What is their Paybill number?

Their pay ill number is 290028.

 How to to up your account?

 How to to up your account?

In order to top up your Account, you ought to go to the Mpesa Menu, Lipa na Mpesa, go to pay bill number and type in  business number 290028, account no. KWIKBET and enter the amount you wish to deposit. 

You are also able to deposit directly from the betting site by clicking in the “Deposit now” option.

How do I check my balance via SMS?

Checking your balance via SMS is simple. All you have to do is SMS the word BALANCE to 29028 and the word BONUS to 29028 to check your bonus balance.

See more reviews like pesawheel.

excerpt.rendered: KWIKBET REVIEW KwikBet is one of the many betting platforms in Kenya today. In the thought and competitive gambling industry
